story.text: NEW YORK Sirius Satellite Radio Inc. (SIRI.O) said on Tuesday it ended 2006 with 6.024 million subscribers and achieved its first quarter of positive free cash flow in the fourth quarter in line with its expectations.Sirius had said in early December that it expected to end the year with between 5.9 million and 6.1 million customers and that after capital spending it could report free cash flow for the quarter.
story.title: sirius reaches 6 mln subscribers , free cash flow positive
